document.full_text: rude outbursts in parliament have revived the prospect of early elections weeks after embattled prime minister silvio berlusconi managed to get his government back on track.
document.title: rude and crude behavior stains italian parliament
lines_and_colors: rude outbursts in parliament have revived the prospect of early elections weeks after embattled prime minister silvio berlusconi managed to get his government back on track.
